p: In order to identify the pathogenicity of F. oxysporum and F. fujikuroi to I. cairica, with artificial inoculation, the lesion areas caused by the two fungi were compared with a positive control and a negative control. The positive control was inoculated with C. gloeosporioides. The negative control was sprayed with sterile potato dextrose broth (Huankai Co., Ltd., Guangzhou, China).
